feed.title: Mautic Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

üêõ Bugs

  • DPMMA-375 fix multiple flash messages by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13187
  • Fixing Undefined project root by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13193
  • fix: [DPMMA-2252] point groups migration fix by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13195
  • Fixing a typo in a controller action path by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13203
  • fix incorrect variable name when setting read only db host by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13211
  • Fix embedding images in mails by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13219
  • Enforce pdo_mysql as doctrine driver as it's the only supported one by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13210
  • Fix invalid javascript:void(). by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13217
  • ensure JS libraries requiring Jquery UI are loaded in the correct order by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13216
  • Add Missing Translations for GrapeJS by @code5rick in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13207
  • Update form.html.twig by @porubma in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13223
  • DPMMA-375 Flash messages are not visiblie in campaign builder by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13205
  • DPMMA-2566 GroupContactScore mapping fix by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13231

New Contributors

  • @porubma made their first contribution in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13223

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/5.0.1...5.0.2

SHA1(5.0.2.zip)= db164a55b94cab87a430aaf521c3378d768c8b2b SHA1(5.0.2-update.zip)= cc2811018b08106ff2d5e36a31e8e92b22c83f16

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 4.4.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

‚ú® Features and enhancements

  • DPMMA-2537 RFC 8058 one-click unsubscribe [backport] by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13117 (read more in our blog post about the upcoming changes to Gmail and Yahoo's spam policies)

üêõ Bugs

  • Fixing Import custom email template functionality by @shinde-rahul in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12495
  • Fix toggle buttons by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12787
  • [backport] Empty the (un)publish dates on email clone by @nick-vanpraet in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12783

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/4.4.10...4.4.11

SHA1(4.4.11.zip)= 7ab01cda2209cca9b057d81c21123d3f064102af SHA1(4.4.11-update.zip)= 259160183cd1864baa6d359c7e367d57946fc21c

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

üêõ Bugs

  • Focus first invalid element of form on validation error by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13247
  • Update preview form script source path for dev enviroment by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13248
  • Fix replace entity with reference for detached lists for add to segment action by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13244
  • Fix incorrect twig field checks for contacts and companies by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13254
  • fix incorrect version of the SpBundle dependency by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13253
  • Fix call to logger warn method. by @AdamBark in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13252
  • Fix incorrect occurrences of dns where it should be dsn by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13259
  • Fix using messenger DSN with special characters by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13255
  • fix incorrect migration from old mail config to mailer_dsn config by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13256
  • add missing translations for flash messages by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13258
  • fix missing filter on contact grid display by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13260
  • Pass mauticTemplateVars to twig templates by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13257
  • Fix incorrect PSR-4 namespaces in tests by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13274
  • Fix broken API output for composer based installs by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13272
  • DPMMA-2566 Support old contactId type in point groups migration by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13284
  • Maut 10853Fixing Array to string conversion by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13287
  • Fix error 500 for Visits URL within time Point action by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12609
  • Bump dependencies to align with composer based installs by @mollux in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13311

New Contributors

  • @AdamBark made their first contribution in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13252

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/5.0.2...5.0.3

SHA1(5.0.3.zip)= 9675c8186ff1645b998d2492421657de9e24528a SHA1(5.0.3-update.zip)= a241d03e6276d76649b825db7fe574a6ff7fb528

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 4.4.12
entry.content:
üîíSecurity release

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîíSecurity fixes

CVE-2021-27915 - XSS Cross-site Scripting Stored in Description field - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-2rc5-2755-v422

CVE-2022-25774 - XSS in Notifications via saving Dashboards - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-fhcx-f7jg-jx3f

CVE-2021-27916 - Relative Path Traversal / Arbitrary File Deletion in GrapesJS builder - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-9fcx-cv56-w58p

CVE-2022-25775 - SQL Injection in dynamic Reports - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-jj6w-2cqg-7p94

CVE-2022-25776 - Sensitive Data Exposure due to inadequate user permission settings - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-qjx3-2g35-6hv8

CVE-2022-25777 - Server-Side Request Forgery in Asset section - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-mgv8-w49f-822w

‚¨ÜÔ∏è Dependencies

  • Upgrade twig package by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13604
  • Upgrade http kernel by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13605
  • Upgrade phpseclib by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13607
  • Upgrade elfinder package by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13608
  • Upgrade composer packages by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13603
  • Upgrade guzzlehttp psr7 by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13606
  • Updating symfony/flex by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13589
  • Update to last gitpod version by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/4.4.11...4.4.12

SHA1(4.4.12.zip)= c5e1406c0bcdb54d75a594a7d24a69ae18f9631c SHA1(4.4.12-update.zip)= 8ea9ceed0bf1876588215423bcb1c27808ecdb29

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.0.4
entry.content:
üîíSecurity release

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîíSecurity fixes

CVE-2021-27915 - XSS Cross-site Scripting Stored in Description field - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-2rc5-2755-v422

CVE-2022-25774 - XSS in Notifications via saving Dashboards - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-fhcx-f7jg-jx3f

CVE-2021-27916 - Relative Path Traversal / Arbitrary File Deletion in GrapesJS builder - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-9fcx-cv56-w58p

CVE-2022-25775 - SQL Injection in dynamic Reports - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-jj6w-2cqg-7p94

CVE-2022-25776 - Sensitive Data Exposure due to inadequate user permission settings - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-qjx3-2g35-6hv8

CVE-2022-25777 - Server-Side Request Forgery in Asset section - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-mgv8-w49f-822w

‚¨ÜÔ∏è Dependencies

Upgrade twig package by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13604 Upgrade http kernel by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13605 Upgrade phpseclib by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13607 Upgrade elfinder package by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13608 Upgrade composer packages by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13603 Upgrade guzzlehttp psr7 by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13606 Updating symfony/flex by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13589 Update to last gitpod version by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13601

üêõ Bugs

  • DPMMA-2401 Use object's timezone when comparing with 'now' in DateTimeHelper by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13320
  • Fix form api create without post action parameter by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13410
  • DPMMA-2462 Fix Autowiring Dependency for PushToIntegrationTrait by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13470
  • DPMMA-2600 Fix for Grapesjs-Mjml self-closing tag issue by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13431
  • The API defines Contacts not Contact causing the API to not receive the correct mapping by @mallezie in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13208
  • Add memory limit to run test maria db by @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13622

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/5.0.3...5.0.4

SHA1(5.0.4.zip)= 593cfded533ea44d0a7dc3bbbedd0eb51ff12aeb SHA1(5.0.4-update.zip)= e7242d4bc728e1def79f8f7a4fef1d188cac5adc
